text: Friendship is an unincorporated community in Cherokee County, North Carolina. ==History== A former variant name was "Suit". The local Suit family were the namesakes. A post office called Suit was established in 1886, and remained in operation until 1955. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Cherokee County, North Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in North Carolina
title: Friendship, Cherokee County, North Carolina
